thread.title: Chris and Sue
thread.title_full: Motorama reviewed by Chris and Sue

author: Chris and Sue
title: Chris and Sue
text:
We recently purchased a Triton from Motorama after a disappointing episode with their local competition. The difference could not have been more stark. Greeted as soon as we entered the showroom, a sales representative then listened to our requirements and showed us the type of vehicle we were after. A test drive was quickly arranged, a valuation for our traded vehicle sorted and after some haggling we left the showroom happy and, I dare say, loyal Motorama customers. A special mention of the representative we dealt with, Nicki Joslin, who who could not have offered more assistance.
Well worth the trip from the Gold Coast.
